content: I think that's a great plan! I'd also like to mention that I had a bit of a fallout with Emily last month, but we've made up since then. It made me realize I need to work on my communication skills and not let my emotions get the better of me. Anyway, back to the game night plan... do you think it's a good idea to have a rotating host or location, or should we just stick to one place for now?
